data.name: Bright Memory: Infinite Cheongsam (New Year) DLC
data.detailed_description:
Unlock the following skins by purchasing the Bright Memory: Infinite Cheongsam (New Year) DLC

Please note that the game is played from a first-person perspective and cannot be changed to a third-person perspective. You will be able to view the character costumes during cutscenes.


  • Cheongsam (New Year): Shelia (Character costume)
  • Assault Rifle: New Year (Weapon skin)
  • Shotgun: New Year (Weapon skin)
  • Handgun: New Year (Weapon skin)
  • Sniper Rifle: New Year (Weapon skin)
  • Eternal Red Blade (Weapon skin)
  • Smartphone wallpaper (Saved in game installation folder)
